title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, September 30, 2020
description: It's the birthday of W.S. Merwin (1927-2019), who asked that his Pulitzer Prize money be given to a painter who was blinded by police in a 1969 Berkeley protest.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
